name: ERC677 Receiver Interface
description: The ERC677 Receiver Interface is a standard interface for receiving ERC677 tokens. It is used by the Chainlink Token contract to receive LINK tokens.

functionDecorators.name: On Token Transfer
functionDecorators.description: Called when a user or another contract wants to transfer funds.

parameterDecorators.name: Sender
parameterDecorators.description: The address that is transferring the tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: Amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of tokens that are being transferred.
